description: iFleet is our Fleet Management System,.  With this system we help you plan your routes easily, see your fleet in real time and get customizable reports.

OptiFare, RADCOM's E-Ticketing System, boosts transport authority efficiency by overseeing all aspects of operations, enhancing transaction transparency and security, saving time, cutting costs, and combating fraud. It offers both card-based and account-based ticketing options.

Exact is our system of processing and predicting the fleet's arrival times for passengers. The accuracy of arrival times in the stops is 1 minute. Passengers can see this information thorugh displays in stops or in vehicles, SMS or custom made mobile apps.
